_description: The Four Evils of Pride — four lines

BLHar7322.Transcription:
Hey priuetȝ gritlichehey Robbetȝ hollicheHey
                    Endetȝ shamelicheHey Draweþ dredfulliche
BLHar7322.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Political, Religious and Love Poems, from Lambeth MS. 306 and other
                sources.
